DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of this web-based, cross-sectional study is to assess and compare the ability to sleep, work or go to school, and to participate in leisure activities among subjects who are receiving Xolair treatment and subjects who were eligible to receive Xolair, but instead have been using Advair for at least 1 year.
DOC.brief_title: Impact of Asthma Treatments on Daily Activities
DOC.criteria: Have asthma and allergies Currently taking Xolair速 or Advair速 Started Xolair速 treatment within the last 4 to 12 months OR have been taking Advair速 for at least 12 months Between 18 and 55 years of age A nonsmoker for at least 6 months Have internet access
